elements.title: What is the same in the apprenticeship contract for all apprentices in the same occupation?

elements.name: question2
elements.title:
Which provision on the termination of the
apprenticeship contract is correct?
choices: The notice period for the apprenticeship contract is two months.
As the apprenticeship contract is limited in time, it cannot be terminated.
The apprenticeship contract is terminated when the qualification procedures have been passed.
The notice period varies depending on the sector.
elements.correctAnswer: As the apprenticeship contract is limited in time, it cannot be terminated.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: An apprenticeship contract can be terminated for good cause. Which of the following reasons is sufficient to terminate the apprenticeship contract without notice?
choices: If the apprentice sells more than trained sales staff
If the apprentice makes too little turnover
When the training company is sold
If the person responsible for vocational training resigns themselves
elements.correctAnswer: When the training company is sold
